title: Bridge to space
creator_credit: Seneca Productions, National Aeronautics and Space Administration, Charles R. Trieschman and Robert Gaffney
brief_description: A bus tour visits the Cape Kennedy Moonport of Project Apollo, recording the impressive sights of the Moonport, of Project A, the Saturn Rockets, the launching pads and control facilities. The tour conductor gives details of the sights.
creator_credit_for_label: Seneca Productions, National Aeronautics and Space Administration, Charles R. Trieschman and Robert Gaffney
